posts.post_title: FS: Tobacco Card Pro Plastic Sheets
posts.post_content: A few years back I was overly ambitious and bought the tobacco card size pro sheets. I have 15 available, never been used. 15 slots per sheet.  Only 6 dollars plus 2 for shipping. Inbox me if interested!
